[00:00.50]Infinity (无穷无尽) - Jaymes Young
[00:00.62]Lyrics by：Jaymes Young/Billboard
[00:00.75]Composed by：Jaymes Young/Billboard
[00:00.87]Oh-oh oh-oh-oh
[00:03.13]
[00:04.07]Oh-oh oh-oh-oh
[00:06.58]
[00:15.03]Baby this love I'll never let it die
[00:20.13]
[00:21.69]Can't be touched by no one
[00:24.76]
[00:25.88]I'd like to see them try
[00:28.18]
[00:31.45]I'm a mad man for your touch
[00:34.16]Girl I've lost control
[00:36.06]
[00:38.91]I'm gonna make this last forever
[00:40.94]Don't tell me it's impossible
[00:43.78]
[00:46.06]'Cause I love you for infinity
[00:48.38]
[00:50.22]I love you for infinity
[00:53.66]'Cause I love you for infinity
[00:56.44]
[00:58.06]I love you for infinity
[01:01.41]
[01:17.77]Oh darling my soul
[01:19.88]
[01:20.97]You know it aches for yours
[01:23.12]
[01:24.17]And you've been filling this hole
[01:27.61]
[01:29.35]Since you were born ooh
[01:34.47]'Cause you're the reason I believe in fate
[01:37.23]You're my paradise
[01:38.95]
[01:42.28]And I'll do anything to be your love
[01:44.87]I'll be your sacrifice
[01:46.84]
[01:49.05]'Cause I love you for infinity
[01:51.54]

[01:56.85]'Cause I love you for infinity
[01:59.60]
[02:00.84]I love you for infinity
[02:04.35]
[02:22.74]Meet me at the bottom of the ocean
[02:25.67]Ocean
[02:26.25]
[02:27.06]Where the time is frozen
[02:29.56]Frozen
[02:30.53]
[02:31.11]Where all the universes open
[02:33.51]Open
[02:34.91]Love isn't random we are chosen
[02:37.59]
[02:39.09]And we could wear the same crown
[02:41.64]
[02:43.03]Keep slowing your heart down
[02:46.02]
[02:47.35]We are the gods now
[02:51.17]
[02:51.92]'Cause I love you for infinity
[02:54.52]
[02:56.05]I love you for infinity
[02:59.73]'Cause I love you for infinity
[03:02.55]
